page.title: 09FARM LIFE
page.content:
At{South Eudon Farm}where a 500 year old house stands in its 400 acres, live the five members of the Fox family. They own 450 ewes and 150 bullocks.
Their land is mostly arable as they grow mainly barley and wheat. They don't grow any vegetables as they used to. There are five tractors; a big 160hp Fiat and a 70hp Fiat, plus three Leylands. One of the newest machines on the farm is a Massey Ferguson{combine harvester}that is computerised.
Besides the farm machinery,there is one car and one pick up for general use and transport. * : * : * : * : * : * : * : *
